text: we were developing a new course uh on
private equity and my belief is and has
been that private Equity really sits at
the
intersection of finance and
strategy and I wanted to find a way to
convey that to the students in a
convincing and Lasting way what we
wanted to do was supplement the case
materials with something that was more
current to give the students a chance to
kind of dig in to the cases Beyond if
you will the four corners of the cases
and also to learn to do the kind of
research that would be required of them
once they go out into the world of
private Equity so we worked with kls to
accomplish both objectives and for every
case for every case discussion we have
this Resource page that kls develops
that in effect points our students to
parts of the internet where they can
find this information and then the
students in each case will go
prior to the class developed their
analysis developed their recommendations
based on this incremental
research uh that they couldn't do based
on case facts then they wrote that up
got it to us the night before we taught
uh we had that posted to the web other
students read it other students reacted
to it we uh identified them in class so
that people knew that they had done a
little extra work so that they might
know the answers to questions that other
students did didn't uh and it I think
really enlivened the discussion made the
discussions richer and brought more
current and different things in the
classroom than we could with just the
case alone the case method by its
nature is such that no
two discussions are identical I mean you
can teach the case 10 times and you will
always have New Perspectives because it
really is a case discussion it's not a
lecture in Disguise it really gives the
students the opportunity to take us
where their brains want to take us but
adding this context research Dimension
makes that even more so uh because not
only have we allowed the students to run
and enable them to run in the direction
that interests them we've actually given
them the tools to go out and be educated
about it so it is it does make for a
very Lively and exciting discussion
